website_summaries.verdict: Includes 109 pieces at a low price point. Large carrying case keeps things organized. An excellent starter kit for home use.
pros: Set of 109 pieces includes screw driving bits of varying lengths/shapes
Bits will work on wood, metal, and plastic
cons: Bits tend to wear out faster than other brands
Components made for light-duty use only

customer_reviews.title: Works For Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start this review by saying I don't know much about tools. All I know is I needed basic tools to do household work. This was cheap, the tools seem to be good quality, and I can do almost everything I need. The only thing missing was the hex tool that a lot of ikea stuff use. Bummer on that. I'll attach images so you can see all of the tools that come in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hale Leon

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars because you get what you pay for, you get a nice case for 14 bucks and a bit set, they aren't quality but it gives you the chance to see what bits you will be using the most and upgrade them to higher quality without spending a bunch of money on a set with high quality bits, that you never use, I bought this with that in mind and if you are expecting anything more from a 14 dollar set... Well that's you being stupid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for; B&D - cheap price, cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: K-R-A-P-O-L-A. I thought it was a nice little carrying case and assortment of drill bits, until I actually needed to use them. The very first home carpentry job, trying to drill through 3" of dried fir with the 1/8" bits, and not one but TWO bits broke off trying to twist them out, after my equally crappy B&D cordless drill chuck kept stripping out and losing the grip on the bits. You get what you pay for. I'm now officially done with cheap Black and Decker junk. Spend the extra money on better quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Paniculture

customer_reviews.title: Good to Have
customer_reviews.text: Full Video Review: [...] Pros: Good set Decent variety Bits seem strong and good quality Cons: each assorted screw counts towards the "109" pieces
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviews

customer_reviews.title: Useful purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with theand I found it to be a great investment. I have used most of these drill bits for a number of outdoor/indoor projects and eventually when I replace the drill for a stronger one (possibly an impact driver) I hope to be able to use these with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Who needs 10 6-point star (torx) bits?
customer_reviews.text: Overall, nice set. A star off for not having any hex head bits and only 1 square head bit, you know, the kinds that you need for all unassembled furniture and one of the best reasons to have a power drill. But it does have 10 sizes of 6-point star bits (torx). When was the last time you needed to screw a torx head? At least versus a hex or square? I was able to drill thin steel pretty easily with the proper bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dull, dull, dull, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice assortment of bits, but the bits are dull right out of the box. I was using them on some poplar which is a fairly soft wood (despite being technically a hardwood). The countersink bit was completely useless; it couldn't cut through the wood at all. The brad point bits were functional but very slow to cut through the wood so I don't expect them to last long. The conventional drill bits were better but still slow cutting. In the long run, I expect I'll throw these all away and keep only the screwdriver bits.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: NOT good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My first disappointment was when I realized the torx (star) bits stopped at T20. For work we use hundreds of screws which are all T25 which is a very common, dare I say the most common torx bit. My second disappointment came after using, and breaking a few bits. They are NOT high quality and break with light use. I'll stand up for B&D's 20V Max tools, but I'll never again waste my money buying any B&D driver bits.
customer_reviews.author: DKK

customer_reviews.title: Good Job
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I drilled a few holes into a wall to put up something for bae, forgot we’re in a row home so there’s brick between us and the neighbors of course. Just take your time and don’t try to force it in without a little TLC if you know what I mean 😉lol. But in all seriousness it did the job and penetrated the brick. It ain’t industrial strength pro quality but it will get most of not all of your round the home needs done in my opinion. Don’t let the negative Nelson’s deter you.
customer_reviews.author: San Quenton

customer_reviews.title: Budget screwdriver set
customer_reviews.text: A great budget screwdriver bit set. Lots of different bits for all of your needs. Definitely light weight and cheap products (you get what you paid for) but a great set to use around the house when you don't do much work. I only do the occasional DIY fix so my old bits didn't get much attention; they were cheap and rusted or broke after several years but they did the job just like these will.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: The drill bits come in a decent variety and are high quality. I have yet to have one break on me. I wish there were additional sizes of masonry drill bits (one more than the largest size and one more than the smallest size would be helpful). My other complaint is that the case frankly isn't that great. Sometimes it doesn't close all the way and bits are difficult to snap in and out of the plastic. I used these bits in the Makita XPH102 and didn't have any significant issues
customer_reviews.author: Edward B

customer_reviews.title: So weirdly happy when boyfriend asked to use my drill bits instead of the other way around.
customer_reviews.text: Either that Was One hell Of a tile, or the masonry bits could use a little more "Umph" . Other than that this was absolutely perfect to compliment my first drill. Great for the price and is still taking a beating from me just about every couple days. The (t20?)driver bit also could be used to be made from a stronger metal if you're asking for suggestions black and decker...
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot but kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like whats included, and most of it is well made. The first time I used the needle nose pliers it instantly broke like it was made out of clay. I worry the screwdriver is going to break as it seems to be of a lower quality, but as of now it works well. If you are looking for an inexpensive screwdriver kit, this works well. It has all kinds of tips to use, I will probably never need them all but it's nice to know I have them. Just don't use the needle nose pliers for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: I have the same review on these drill bits as I do for the black and decker drill I purchased, I'm disappointed that black and decker is made in China and not the USA anymore, these drill bits, and I haven't used them quite yet, just received them, but they appear to be able to do the job I need them for, which is doing work around the house, the storage case they come in is great, I hope they hold up for awhile, I'll update my review if anything negative happens with them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gove

customer_reviews.title: I would not  Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used these was the day that I got them. In the first day five drill bits Broke & three Screw driver heads broke. Like really. It may come with a lot of bits but it’s because your going to brake a few ever time you use it. Like for really. & @ this point it’s not even worth trying to send it back or to try to get a refund. I should have just done what I should have done & gone to some hard ware store & bout them from There.
customer_reviews.author: MR. & MR. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Strips and not in the fun way.
customer_reviews.text: The drill bit stripped after a few second. We bought these because we lost our old ones and it seems like are old ones were much higher quality. Will probably just throw them away and spend a little more on ones that will hold up. They literally fall apart doing simple jobs. They are just trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace what I lost.
customer_reviews.text: Over time, I don't know what happened but I lost my drills and bits. I was doing my usual browse here on amazon and this one lit up the page and I couldn't pass it on. So I bought it. I got it today along with the other tools I bought. I used them. Punched a bunch of stuff of the walls and hanged some stuff. These set is pretty high quality and durable. Price was just right Extremely happy.
customer_reviews.author: AntLeiMel

customer_reviews.title: Products like this should be banned from sale
customer_reviews.text: This item should be used as a boat anchor broke 3 bits today and rounded off 2 Screwdriver bits . Products like this should be banned from sale. Amazon needs to screen the products they are selling with products just makes you want to shop else where. BIG TIME JUNK .
customer_reviews.author: RickBallard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small home improvement projects
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small home improvement projects. I don't consider myself a handy man at all, but during this pandemic I've been keeping myself busy by learning to do small home improvements projects around the house. This drill bit set has been extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your first set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your first set. Although if u need this for professional use just skip. THESE drill bits are not durable enough to use on a regular base. After first use hex drill bit bent out of shape was still able do my project. Will have everything u need be genital or they will bend out of shape soft steal.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Sosa

customer_reviews.title: What a spectacular assortment for such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I know these aren't diamond tipped platinum coated ceramic fusion bits. I also know they are very reasonably priced for such a sexy assortment of bits! I expect the quality will be good for my home crafts and ordinary dinker around stuff. AND A QUALITY CASE? Get out of my way.
customer_reviews.author: sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: A couple of things: 1. Not durable at all. I used the screw driver bit to drill into pressed wood and it wore down the head on several to the extent that I cannot use those pieces anymore 2. While I appreciate that they don’t fall out of place, you could easily cut yourself trying to remove the pieces 3. I was pleased with the pricing but would definitely opt to purchase steel pieces next time to avoid needing to drill holes before placing screws I wouldn’t recommend for long term or multiple uses / would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good bits that didn't break.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get them back into the case though. I really have to ream on it with my screwdriver sometimes to get them to pop up and out. They haven't broken for me yet and they feel like they'd be good for smaller projects. I have a 4 amp drill and it could barely handle me going through particleboard, these are probably at that same level lol.
customer_reviews.author: Trrog Boglin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Im a long time user of black and decker products. The only rub on this bit set is the variety. They missed a couple categories
customer_reviews.author: Ranjit

customer_reviews.title: They're way stronger than I expected! Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Man, I have absolutely nothing back to say bad about this set! Very sturdy!! An array of choices. Perfect accessory kit! What could be a "con": I guess? The smaller/skinnier drill bit are hard to get out and put back in. In actuality it is a good thing bc it is holding each piece in place.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: For basic home maintenance and repairs these bits are perfect. The multitude of options makes anything that i need possible. I've used the bits quite a bit in the house. Mainly walls and studs and they remain sharp without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: ADPBR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basic project box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little project box which also works well as a gift, containing a nice assortment of bits, including doubles of the smallest ones which tend to break, drivers, bits, and even a container of screws. I do wish instead of the 2 inch bits they would have included more masonary bits, or another container for screws, since there is already a magnetic bit holder which functions as an extender as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Messy overall it's fine.
customer_reviews.text: The tools were fine but the packaging was a mess. All together for the price it's fine and fits my needs. I got it from Amazon wearhouse deal for like $12. But it looked like it was dropped or thrown multiple times. The fittings to hold the tools are very tight so tight that it was hard to get them back in the oiginal spots. Leads me to believe either the wearhouse never checked it or the delivery guy was playing soccer with it either way still an okay prduct.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This has everything I need as a homeowner. Great variety of tools. Definitely worth the price paid. The tiny drillbits are a little tough to remove and I worried about breaking them. I’ve found if you pull them out straight (as opposed to up toward you) they come out much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit. No hex bits.
customer_reviews.text: Has pretty much everything you need but no hex bits for thise endless allen wrench jobs. Has a lot of bits you may never need, but all accessory kits are like that in my experience. Nice selection of reasonably good drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: SYOTW

customer_reviews.title: JUNK BLACK+DECKER Screwdriver Bit Set / Drill Bit Set
customer_reviews.text: The drill bits are not properly heat treated. The bit stapped after drilling less than a half-inch in softwood... The total time the bit was used was less than 30 seconds...
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bough it for my sister who felt it was perfectly normal to just make use of mine for long stretches of time. Now when she needs projects done, I don't have to be involved and our relationship is saved since my stuff won't be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: IslandFaves

customer_reviews.title: solid well organized case
customer_reviews.text: solid well organized case, drills and bit seem good, limited testing but worked as expected
customer_reviews.author: Wawayanda Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: The bits are so difficult to remove and replace
customer_reviews.text: The variety is OK, there should have been a couple hex bits at least instead of the same Philips and Flat head over and over. Also, the smallest Philips/Flat bit is still too large. The main issue for me, however, is the design of the storage box. The slots are too narrow and it is very difficult to remove/insert the bits.
customer_reviews.author: Tonmoy

customer_reviews.title: supper bummed on this product. The drill bits are ...
customer_reviews.text: supper bummed on this product. The drill bits are cheap. I have already had two of the bits snap in-half. This was not "operator error"! I know how to use my tools. My father has taught me well.
customer_reviews.author: TheBoys1999

customer_reviews.title: Very good though more than we needed
customer_reviews.text: Always a fan of Black+Decker. The drill is great. My husband was super excited about it. Was a really good deal as well. I wish there were more options for different kits you could buy with the drill. We can only use about half the things it came with. Wish there were more options
customer_reviews.author: Adaveve

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well but quality is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: This is packaged well however, I have concern about the quality of the product. I used the 1/16 which is the tiniest bit in a plastic part of my car to install a camera and it broke after I pulled it out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: The wood bits are a little difficult to remove without stabbing yourself. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little assortment for the price! Hard to beat. Have used almost every attachment provided and it works great. Mind you these are not top quality tools so some will break with heave loads
customer_reviews.author: Warwrecker

customer_reviews.title: The case is cheap and won't stay closed, and Black and Decker doesn't care.
customer_reviews.text: The bits look good, but the case they come in is so cheap that I'm returning it. I called Black and Decker to describe the problem, and they do not warranty or stand behind the case that holds the bits... only the bits. So they said I should just return to Amazon if I'm not happy. One clasp doesn't work now, and the other one is barely holding on. The plastic on the clasp is so cheap and thin that I believe this is a design problem and not a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart W. Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Handy & Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this accessory kit along with the Black & Decker LDX120C cordless drill, and I'm glad that I did. I recently completed a household project in which I used several drill bits from this kit, along with some screwdriver heads, and they all performed very well. If someone is thinking about purchasing the aforementioned cordless drill, I would recommend getting this accessory kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: VERY HANDY ITEM
customer_reviews.text: ALTHOUGH I JUST RECEIVED IT...I USED IT ON AN OUTDOOR PROJECT AND IT REALLY CAME IN HANDY...ALL DRILL BITS AND DRIVER BITS ARE NEATLY PLACED IN THERE SPOT. MAKES ANY PROJECT GO QUICKER AND EASIER
customer_reviews.author: DELRAYSTU

customer_reviews.title: Great bits
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need in one case, organized, lightweight. Some of the pieces can be a little difficult to remove from their spots -- some pull out easier, some slide out easier. Other than that though it's great.
customer_reviews.author: ayoa2

customer_reviews.title: Good general drill bit set
customer_reviews.text: This contains all the basic drill bits a household would need. I would just pay attention if you're needing a specific size or type of bit. I originally purchased this to blanket all my needs... Eventually I needed to go out & buy a 1/2 inch drill bit, as this contains fairly standard sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great Selection
customer_reviews.text: This Box has everything you need to get started on any project that requires a drill/driver. Made a Fine companion to the B&D 3/8 in. Drill/Driver. Price was real good too.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Like my bits
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different pieces but hard to put back into slots!
customer_reviews.author: talene harvel

customer_reviews.title: Round heads don't fit the B+D Impact driver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the B+D Impact Drill that has great reviews, but 30 or more of the 109 piece accessory kit don't fit the impact driver. I assumed they would all fit. Might come in handy but I don't like surprises when I spend money and don't get what I should have.
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of low quality bits
customer_reviews.text: This set offers a wide range of bits useful for a lot of different projects. The counter sink bit was a nice addition although it seems awfully dull. A good starter kit, but expect to shell out more money soon on replacement bits. On only the second or third hole using the 1/4" steel bit, the bit broke in half and I had to gouge the remainder of the bit from the 2x4. Variety offered: 10/10 Quality: 3/10
customer_reviews.author: Jake W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase - poor quality drill bits that broke during first use and drill heated up
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to see such a complete and affordable drill bit set from black & decker to go along with the black & decker ~$50 tool set, but I suppose that they have different levels of quality. During the first use, one of the drill bits broke and even after an entire night of charging the drill, it had almost no power after 10 mins of on/off use and heated up to the point that I needed to give it a break. I contacted Amazon and will be returning the entire set.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is weird. It comes with plastic inserts that ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is weird. It comes with plastic inserts that I assumed were meant to keep the bolts in place when shipping but if you take them out and close the case, the case doesn't close properly. You need to keep the plastic inserts in the case to allow it to close correctly. Kind of inconvenient. I'd prefer to just be able to open and go instead of having to move the plastic inserts every time I want to use a drill bit.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Good set, could use a wider variety and a better case
customer_reviews.text: This set has a lot of different bits, although the case on mine does not close properly unless I have the plastic covers inside. That's not a huge deal but it's definitely odd. Also, while there are a ton of bits I still find situations where I could use more. Not the fault of this again, but I think that including a variety rather than a lot of the same ones would be more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Speiser

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a very good deal from what I have used of it. I have found it isn't so easy putting items back when finished. Arthritis doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Drill bit
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - A variety of drill bits (but no 3/8") that appear durable and solidly built. Cons: - Very difficult to safely snap bits back into place after use. - Had a significant amount of difficulty drilling into a wood stud with the 3/16" drill bit.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas

customer_reviews.title: 109 piece including about 32 screws
customer_reviews.text: Still nice for the price. I would probably have given it a 5 star if not for the cheap marketing of claiming 109 piece and counting the screws to get there.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go with my new Black + Decker LDX120C 20-Volt MAX Lithium-Ion Cordless Drill/Driver. I wanted something I could put my hands on when I needed general bits. I have lots of different size bits in "several places" around the garage and was tired of hunting them down. It fits nicely in the Black & Decker BDCMTSB Matrix Wide-Mouth Storage Bag I purchased for the drill and the bit case. As always Black + Decker is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: IBIUBU

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit, but lacks contents file
customer_reviews.text: This kit would be a complete with a product info sheet. Lots of time spent trying to ID contents. Needs PDF illustration. Nice Phillips & flathead tips. I'd rather have 1⁄4, 3⁄8, 1⁄2 adapters over mini sockets. I'll be sending my screwdriver kit back.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dolle

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for a beginner lady
customer_reviews.text: First of all I am a female first time buyer for this. For a beginner I believe I have bought something decent for a great price. I love the box. So organized. These fit my RYOBI drill.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bit Selection
customer_reviews.text: The B&D drill bit set has just about everything needed for home DIY projects that include drilling holes and driving and removing screws .
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Ockinga

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my power drill
customer_reviews.text: A great set of tools for my toolbox to do my apartment projects and fixes. How needs a husband when you have the right tools for the job? Lolol
customer_reviews.author: Grace Solis

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and even I can't kill it! DIY Me!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely well maintained fashion. Came in a kit , drill and bits included, for a reasonable price. No fancy instructions, just do what a drill kit does. With that being said, I can destroy an anvil with a rubber mallet, and it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: FDR

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo DULL
customer_reviews.text: The drill bits are so dull that you have to press hard to get them to make any progress in wood or metal. Absolutely not a set you would buy to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Kael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Set
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome set, honestly I just bought it for a basic drill bit set but the inclusion of all of the different types of bits and other application specific drill bits is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Big Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: A Good Set of Drills
customer_reviews.text: This set of drills covers most jobs that you'll run into around the house and shop. Just be sure to keep your drill description card included when you open it. I threw mine away, so I just have to guess which drill bit to use on a particular job.
customer_reviews.author: Nexxus

customer_reviews.title: Working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I was a bit insecure if purchasing this parts after reading the comments. I think that for the kind of work I'm using them for, they are perfect. If of course, you need as a professional, don't really understand why you buy it cheap in this site... 😅
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Get it with your first power drill.
customer_reviews.text: More drill bits than I will likely ever need for anything short of making giant holes, and I already got hole saw bits for that.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer MHM 3-5

customer_reviews.title: HANDY DRILL BITS
customer_reviews.text: They are nice drill bits, as a woman, don't know quite what to say about them, other than they work in my drill.
customer_reviews.author: Mrslhs

customer_reviews.title: Nice set to have!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase, for the do it yourself to work on your home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: what a great screwdriver bit for only 12$ - great buy - you couldn't possibly ever need another bit - set - so many here
customer_reviews.author: D. Libby

customer_reviews.title: It broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: One of the drill bit broke after only one use. Very disappointed. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Maaron

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Really like the drill bits everything that comes with it you get a lot works great with my rechargeable drill
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Best deal so far.
customer_reviews.text: I like this set so far. But the reason I give it four stars is because the plastic box that they come in could be a little better design. It's not easy to close and snap. And the bits are not easy to take out from where they were set in the box. They were too tight. If not careful you can break the bit while trying to take it out. For me 109 pieces were little overkill for around the house project. But for the quality I think it is still the best deal around.
customer_reviews.author: Thanya Moolmuang

customer_reviews.title: bits to go with my new drill
customer_reviews.text: I"m excited to get this bit set. I bought a drill a month or so ago and it only came with one bit. I like the fact that all the bits are in case. The case is not very big so doesn't take up much space. The set has just about any bit that might be needed for making repairs or building things. My dad was a carpenter for over 40 and years and I feel he would have been proud of me for making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccasextonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great a investment. It is made to perfection. It is a complete set. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love it, has all the pieces you can think of bought the drill with it and it was the best value ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kristinas3

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit, because it has everything I need. I am glad it comes with a case, because I have lost so many bits by not having something to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality drillbit set
customer_reviews.text: High quality durable bits you won’t be disappointed. The drill is really good too good for home work
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Penor

customer_reviews.title: This is ridiculous product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time today on September 15 2019 , and screw driver bit was so brittle that it broke on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Mian

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a black and decker drill machine. The drill bits are cheap made and broke with first use. Wouldn't recommend it
customer_reviews.author: shereen

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to replace bits
customer_reviews.text: The smaller bits in particular can't really be snapped in at all easily, so you have to slide them. To slide them, of course, you have to push on the tip, which is a serious problem with the sharper bits.
customer_reviews.author: Nereus

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son, he has used pieces for different projects and says it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hope B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Now I'm stuck with a hole with ...
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to drill a hole with one of the supplied drill tips in this case.... It broke in half while trying to drill. Bad quality. Now I'm stuck with a hole with a drill tip stuck in it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer7778

customer_reviews.title: okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Items are not so easy to remove, case is solid and was expecting that it would have few more larger size bits
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: broke two drill bits but worth it in some ways because it has some other bits you need
customer_reviews.author: flying

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This tool kit has come in handy for my husband a number of times since igot it for him. I dont know what he did without it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peverill

customer_reviews.title: SEEMS USEFUL -HARDLY USED THE SET
customer_reviews.text: I can't give a full review because I haven't used all the bits and most likely won't. If I ever do I'll update. This item was featured and I ended up buying it thinking I needed it but in reality it was more than I needed.. and then some. I'm sure it'll be fully useful to someone who can actually utilize the set. I'm giving this four stars because it'll be useful for the right implications, was more after suggesting something I don't need, but in all has many handy drill bits.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set for the Occasional Home Project
customer_reviews.text: I’m not doing a lot with my drill- hanging mirrors, putting up window fixtures, that sort of thing. This is the perfect set for me and it has worked really well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rabidus Matris

customer_reviews.title: Good for organization
customer_reviews.text: Everything was accounted for. I bought this for better organization and to have all the bits for the drill that a homeowner could need around the house. One of the latches on the case was broke , not a big deal to me as it still stays close and it gets out in the toolbox anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: good bang for buck lots of useable options - cement bits will be a use once or twice and they are done but others fine.
customer_reviews.author: E J

customer_reviews.title: I did not realize that most of the items were ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that most of the items were cheap tiny screws!! I thought i was ordering 109 different bits. What i got was about 50 bits and 59 tiny cheap screws I have no use for. Lesson learned. Read the Small Print! Still deceptive advertising though!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Hubby likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for my husband for Father's Day. My husband likes it and has already used it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Estes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for Christmas and he was thrilled. He uses it constantly and has had zero problems with it. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Bates

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case makes it nice and easy to get around on my tool boxes already full, it's nice
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for a young man just starting out. He loved the gift.
customer_reviews.author: sandy l justice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all of my home & shelving/crafting needs!
customer_reviews.text: Best drill bit set! Super affordable and it comes with all of the most commonly used bits and sizes. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not really B+D, but good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that they included brad-point bits in the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Allmon

customer_reviews.title: Has every thing that I needed, However it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Has every thing that I needed, However it does not hold attachments all that well. The bit holder will drop the bit, lost one so far and found the other 2 i found.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Its Black And Decker. Not the best quality but I am rating this on an overall. The price is great. If you want something that will last for decades that is put through heavy usage daily, like on a construction site, then this is not for you. If you are going to use it to fix things around the house every so often, this will last probably for a long time and is very sufficient for that purpose. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: TychiBalls

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing that I need some replacement bits and ended up getting more than I thought I was getting. Well priced and served its purpose. Drill bits seem pretty strong for the price. Only time will tell true durability, but this is more than enough for simple house projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit it was a great price and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bits are not straight and simply cannot be used. How does this pass their quality control? Waste of space, waste of cash, im sure there is a better package to buy out there for the same amount of money. Utterly disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER Screwdriver Bit Set / Drill Bit Set, 109-Piece (BDA91109)
product_meta.description: The BLACK & DECKER BDA91109 109pc Combination Accessory Set contains the ideal sizes of components for frequent use projects and installation. It offers a variety of drill bits for the most common uses with wood, metal, plastic and masonry. Along with the drill bits, it also contains a variety of 2-Inch and 1-Inch screwdriving bits for household projects. This convenient kit also comes with a durable, portable hard case with extra storage.
feature_bullets: Variety of Drill Bits for wood, metal, plastic and masonry
Variety of 1-Inch and 2-Inch screw driving bits
Ideal size of components for all types of projects
Variety of Drill Bits for wood, metal, plastic and masonry
Ideal size of components for all types of projects
